representation_information.name: ISO/IEC 10918-1:1994. Information technology -- Digital compression and coding of continuous-tone still images, lossless (formal name); Original lossless JPEG (common name)
representation_information.description: Lossless compression encoding for full color and grayscale continuous-tone images. Provides for sequential lossless encoding and decoding. Not based on the DCT [discrete cosine transform] used for regular JPEG.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
